SELECT CASE WHEN hdp.is_month = '0' THEN CONCAT(hdp.lock_period,'天') WHEN hdp.is_month = '1' THEN CONCAT(hdp.lock_period,'个月') END AS lock_period, hdp.plan_invest_status,
hdp.plan_name AS debtPlanName, hdpa.user_id, hdpa.accede_order_id, hdpa.user_name, hdpa.client, hdpa.quit_time, hdpa.plan_nid, hdpa.accede_account, hdpa.already_invest, hdpa.order_status, hdpa.wait_total, hdpa.wait_captical, hdpa.wait_interest, IFNULL( FROM_UNIXTIME( IF ( hdpa.count_interest_time = 0, NULL, hdpa.count_interest_time ), '%Y-%m-%d' ), '' ) AS count_interest_time, hdpa.send_status, hdpa.commission_status,
FROM_UNIXTIME( hdpa.commission_count_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS commission_count_time,
date_format(hdpa.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time,
hdpa.create_time AS add_time_long, hdpa.invite_user_name referee_name, hdpa.invite_user_attribute AS recommend_attr, hdpa.invite_user_name AS invite_name, hdpa.invite_user_attribute AS invite_user_attributename, hdpa.user_attribute AS attribute, ruser2.attribute AS user_attribute, hdpa.invite_user_regionname, hdpa.invite_user_branchname, hdpa.invite_user_departmentname, CASE WHEN hcc.coupon_type = '1' THEN '体验金' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = '2' THEN '加息券' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = '3' THEN '代金券' ELSE '现金' END AS tender_type, IFNULL(hcu.coupon_user_code, '') AS coupon_code, od3.name AS invite_user_regionname1, od2.name AS invite_user_branchname1, od.name AS invite_user_departmentname1, odx3.name AS invite_user_regionname2, odx2.name AS invite_user_branchname2, odx.name AS invite_user_departmentname2, hdpa.invite_user_id as referee_user_id, ruser1.truename as referee_true_name, hdpa.invite_user_id as invite_user_id, ruser1.truename as invite_true_name, hta.status AS contractStatus, hta.contract_number AS contract_number, hta.download_url AS download_url, hta.viewpdf_url AS viewpdf_url, hta.img_url AS img_url,
hdpa.expect_apr AS expectApr, hdpa.accede_account AS jAccedeAccount, hdpa.already_invest AS jalreadyInvest, hdpa.available_invest_account AS availableInvestAccount, hdpa.frost_account AS frostAccount,
CASE WHEN hdpa.order_status =5 OR hdpa.order_status =7 THEN hdpa.fair_value ELSE 0 END AS fairValue,
hdpa.actual_apr AS actualApr, hdpa.invest_counts AS investCounts, hdpa.match_dates AS matchDates, case when hdpa.end_date is not null then date_format(hdpa.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') else '' end as end_date, CASE WHEN hdpa.acctual_payment_time =0 OR hdpa.acctual_payment_time is null THEN '' ELSE FROM_UNIXTIME(hdpa.acctual_payment_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') END AS acctual_payment_time FROM ht_hjh_accede hdpa LEFT JOIN ht_r_user ruser1 ON hdpa.invite_user_id = ruser1.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_plan hdp ON hdpa.plan_nid = hdp.plan_nid LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hcrt.real_tender_id = hdpa.accede_order_id LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_tender hct ON hct.order_id = hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hcu.id = hct.coupon_grant_id LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcc.coupon_code = hcu.coupon_code LEFT JOIN ht_tender_agreement hta ON hta.tender_nid = hdpa.accede_order_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user ruser2 ON ruser2.user_id = hdpa.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users ou ON ou.hyd_id = hdpa.invite_user_id AND ou.user_status IN ('E', 'Q1', 'Q11', 'Q2', 'Q21') LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department od ON od.id = ou.departmentid AND od.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department od2 ON od2.id = od.parentid LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department od3 ON od3.id = od2.parentid LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users oux ON oux.hyd_id = hdpa.user_id AND oux.user_status IN ('E', 'Q1', 'Q11', 'Q2', 'Q21') LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department odx ON odx.id = oux.departmentid AND odx.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department odx2 ON odx2.id = odx.parentid LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department odx3 ON odx3.id = odx2.parentid
AND hdp.plan_nid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{debtPlanNidSrch}, '%')
AND hdpa.accede_order_id = #{accedeOrderIdSrch}
AND hdpa.user_name LIKE CONCAT( #{userNameSrch},'%')
AND hdpa.lock_period = #{debtLockPeriodSrch}
AND ruser1.username LIKE CONCAT( #{refereeNameSrch},'%')
AND hdpa.order_status LIKE CONCAT( #{orderStatus},'%')
AND hdpa.client = #{platformSrch}
AND hdpa.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{searchStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND hdpa.create_time <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{searchEndDate}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND hdpa.count_interest_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{countInterestTimeStartDate})
AND hdpa.count_interest_time <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{countInterestTimeEndDate},' 23:59:59'))
AND hdpa.match_dates = #{matchDatesSrch}
AND hdpa.invest_counts = #{investCountsSrch}
and hdpa.end_date >= CONCAT(#{endDateStartSrch},' 00:00:00')
and hdpa.end_date <= CONCAT(#{endDateEndSrch},' 23:59:59')
AND FROM_UNIXTIME( hdpa.acctual_payment_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) >= #{acctualPaymentTimeStartSrch}
AND FROM_UNIXTIME( hdpa.acctual_payment_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{acctualPaymentTimeEndSrch}
ORDER BY add_time_long DESC
limit #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT hhp.plan_nid plan_nid, hhp.plan_name plan_name, hha.accede_order_id accede_order_id, CONCAT(hhp.expect_apr, '%') expect_apr, CASE WHEN hhp.borrow_style ='endday' THEN CONCAT(hhp.lock_period,'天') ELSE CONCAT(hhp.lock_period,'个月') END AS lock_period, hha.user_id user_id, hha.accede_account accede_account, hha.create_time AS add_time, IFNULL(FROM_UNIXTIME( IF(hha.quit_time=0,NULL,hha.quit_time), '%Y-%m-%d' ),'待确认') AS quit_time, IFNULL(FROM_UNIXTIME( IF(hha.last_payment_time=0,NULL,hha.last_payment_time), '%Y-%m-%d' ),'待确认') AS last_payment_time, IFNULL(FROM_UNIXTIME( IF(hha.acctual_payment_time=0,NULL,hha.acctual_payment_time), '%Y-%m-%d' ),'待确认') AS acctual_payment_time, IFNULL(FROM_UNIXTIME( IF(hha.count_interest_time=0,NULL,hha.count_interest_time), '%Y-%m-%d' ),'待确认') AS count_interest_time, hha.wait_total wait_total, hha.wait_interest wait_interest, hha.received_total received_total, hha.received_interest received_interest, (hha.wait_total + hha.received_total) all_total, (hha.wait_interest + hha.received_interest) all_interest, SUBSTRING(FORMAT(hha.should_pay_total,4),1,LENGTH(FORMAT(hha.should_pay_total,4))-2) AS should_pay_total, (SELECT hbs.NAME FROM ht_borrow_style hbs where hbs.nid = hhp.borrow_style limit 1 ) repay_method, hha.order_status order_status, FROM_UNIXTIME(hhr.repay_actual_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS repay_actual_time FROM ht_hjh_accede hha LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_plan hhp ON hha.plan_nid=hhp.plan_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_repay hhr ON hhr.accede_order_id = hha.accede_order_id WHERE hha.accede_order_id = #{accedeOrderIdSrch} and hha.user_id =#{userId}
